title: DEVELOPING NATIONS REQUIRE GREATER FOCUS IN INTERNATIONAL SYSTEM : Professor G.L. Peiris addressing UN General Assembly
content: Sri Lanka believes that in the settlement of international disputes, action must be based on the fundamental principle of sovereign equality of states, a principle firmly enshrined in the Charter of the United Nations, stated Professor G.L. Peiris, Minister of External Affairs in his address yesterday to the 67th Session of the UN General Assembly….
